definition: meticulous/(of domestic animals or fowls) young

sentences.english: Cross-fostering must be complete max. 36 hours after farrowing.
sentences.chinese: 一定要在仔豬出生36小時之內完成仔豬的寄養。

sentences.english: Cross-fostering must be complete max. 36 hours after farrowing.
sentences.chinese: 一定要在仔豬出生36小時之內完成仔豬的寄養。

sentences.english: All of above show that dextran iron can control piglets anaemia effectively.
sentences.chinese: 表明葡聚糖酐鐵對仔豬貧血有良好的防治效果。

sentences.english: You can express the milk into the mouth of the piglet.
sentences.chinese: 確保將初乳喂到仔豬的嘴中。

sentences.english: Enterotoxigenic escherichia coil (ETEC) related with diarrhoea of early-weaned piglets.
sentences.chinese: 產腸毒素性大腸桿菌與仔豬腹瀉的致病過程密切相關。

sentences.english: Table 1 shows the performance of weanling pigs fed diets supplemented with two types of feed additives.
sentences.chinese: 表1顯示了餵了兩種類型飼料添加劑仔豬的生長性能。

sentences.english: The invention discloses Chinese herbal medicine compound premix used for piglets.
sentences.chinese: 本發明公開了乳仔豬用中草藥複合預混料。

sentences.english: The weaned piglets diarrhea was a kind of disease that seriously harmed swine industry.
sentences.chinese: 斷奶仔豬腹瀉是一類嚴重危害養豬業發展的疾病。

sentences.english: Response to nutritious stress is necessary for early-weaned piglet to survive.
sentences.chinese: 營養應激反應對於早期斷乳仔豬的生存是必需的。

sentences.english: Litters were standardized to 12 piglets beyond 48 h after birth.
sentences.chinese: 於產後48小時，將每窩調整至12頭仔豬。

sentences.english: 2nd and 3rd parity sows are best at accepting new small piglets.
sentences.chinese: 第二和第三胎的母豬是最易接受小仔豬的。

sentences.english: A different nursery site is used each week on an all-in, all-out basis.
sentences.chinese: 每週按全進全出的原則將仔豬轉入不同的保育場。

sentences.english: It is vitally important to encourage piglets to maintain fluid intake post-weaning.
sentences.chinese: 仔豬斷奶時維持液體攝取量極其重要。

sentences.english: We conclude the MLV is safe for piglets.
sentences.chinese: 本試驗表明弱毒疫苗對仔豬是安全的。

sentences.english: Sows eat their young because they need the phosphorous.
sentences.chinese: 大母豬喫仔豬，因爲它們缺少磷質。
